entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #61777
  • [OpenAPI] XML Comments not translated to OpenApi json #61776
  • Get rid of custom reference resolution system, use built-in nuget features #61775
  • Allow the `sub` for a user-jwt to be set, independent of the `name` #61773
  • Minimal API Validation throws when using Entity Framework #61770
  • Perf regression: mTls-handshakes-kestrel, tls-handshakes-kestrel, tls-renegotiation-kestrel #61769
  • Add `PersistKeysToStackExchangeRedis` overload which accepts `Func<IServiceProvider, IDatabase>` #61768
  • Kestrel HTTP3 endpoint validate server name for client certificate by default #61767

Closed

  • Min API validation throws when IValidatableObject returns ValidationResult without MemberNames #61739
  • Check minified .js files back in #56933
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Min API validation doesn't consider List<T>? members #61737
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #61765

PullRequests

Created

  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #61780
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.3] Update Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel to 8.0.2 #61779
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `cd430b4` to `90a4152` #61772
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump dotnet/arcade from 11c848003df85813f4821fec2d43290fd4ca8594 to 43abe63bfc701d34e6599490a557a74710693410 #61771
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Make IValidatableObject handling more resilient for MemberNames #61778
    area-minimal, feature-validation, 10.0-preview5
  • Fix username for dependabot #61774
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5
  • Fix handling of nullable types in validations generator #61766
    area-minimal, feature-validation, 10.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add host.docker.internal and host.containers.internal to the dev cert SAN #61265
    area-commandlinetools, pending-ci-rerun
  • Blazor - rendering metrics and tracing #61609
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview5
  • update template descriptions to be more beginner-friendly #61593
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview5
  • Update helix references #61755
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Remove the check for `cacheBootResources` from Auto render mode detection #61666
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview5
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #61745
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash on shell navigation for Mac Catalyst #29297
  • WebP support for resizetizer #29296
  • Maui IOS System.NullReferenceException - Arg_NullReferenceException #29294
  • MAUI Android System_InvalidOperationException_Window was already activated #29293
  • MAUI Android System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException - ArgumentOutOfRange_IndexMustBeLess #29292
  • MAUI Android System.InvalidOperationException: InvalidOperation_EnumFailedVersion #29291
  • I1_Vertical_list_for_Multiple_Rows - Rotating the emulator would cause text to overflow. #29287

Closed

  • Editor with AutoSize=EditorAutoSizeOption.TextChanges bad performance on iOS #27698
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • .NET MAUI Problem with rendering ListView/CollectionView on Android #12070
    Backlog
  • Unable to Launch IOS app into iphone. #29290
  • IsVisible being explicitly set in construction, then changed through binding later doesn't respect the later state #29060
  • Issue with input type number in Blazor hybrid app #29115
  • .Net 9 Blazor compilation fail for Conflicting assets #29114
  • Issue with .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid MSIX Installation – Missing Executable #29119
  • .NET 9 Maui Hybrid Web Template cannot handle page refreshes (InvalidOperationException: Cannot provide a value for property 'Http' on type 'MauiApp1) #29116

PullRequests

Created

  • XAML xmlns simplifications #29298
  • [Windows] Fix for Assigning null to the SelectedItem of the CollectionView in the SelectionChanged event does not clear the selection #29288
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for CarouselView IsSwipeEnabled=False Prevents Visual Navigation #29286
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [net10.0] Merge main net10 #29273
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [net10.0] Update preview4 dotnet #29254
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [NET10.0] Annotate converters for nullability 2/n #29276
    community ✨

Updated

  • Add the ability to intercept all web resource requests #28876
    area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [iOS]Fix: FlyoutPage memory leak #28769
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] SpacingItemDecoration improvement #27093
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Fixed the flyout icon and content page disappeared when focus on the shell search handler #28474
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Remove Compatibility.Layout as a subclass of all modern .NET MAUI controls #29281
    t/breaking 💥, area-layout, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [Android] Fixed Setting a Label visible after having had focus on a InputView will increase the Label's height #29210
    p/0, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [2025/04/28] Candidate - In Flight Branch #29158
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar Black Background Issue When Setting Transparent Background #29225
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] - Fix KeepScrollOffset Behavior During Dynamic Item Additions in CollectionView #29255
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android & iOS]Make SearchHandler's Focus() and Unfocus() work #29278
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix for First Item in CollectionView Overlaps in FlyoutPage.Flyout on iOS #29265
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for ImagePaint Not rendering in View #29205
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Implemented the Resize and Downsize functions in the W2DImage class #29138
    platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows]Fix NullReferenceException in OpenReadAsync for FileResult created with full path #28238
    platform/windows 🪟, area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for Flyout title is not broken over multiple lines when you rotate your screen. #29171
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-flyout, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed Shell flyout background image does not displayed #28977
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Controls Disappear When WebView is Used with Hardware Acceleration Disabled #28934
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed Horizontal Spacing for Horizontal List #28311
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Path Rendering Issue Inside StackLayout When Margin Is Set #28071
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the picker items do not appear when tapping on the picker after navigating through PushModalAsync #28003
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed TransformProperties issue when a wrapper view is present #29228
    area-animation, platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Incorrect Window.Y and Window.Height values when closing a maximized window #29253
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix CarouselView EmptyView display when filtering to zero items #29247
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Shell] Changed TitleProperty From TwoWay to OneWay #29280
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Indicator View Causing Looping Issue with CarouselView #27880
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ProjectSystemProjectOptionsProcessor does not set CompilationOptions when given empty command line #78423
  • IDE0055 false positive for C# 14 extension methods #78422
  • Decouple Metadata as Source from the LSP miscellaneous files workspace #78421
  • IDE0022 for non-single line methods (comments) #78419
  • Extension everything public metadata types break .NET package validation #78416
  • Unable to use extension everything to write a generic Cast that works with LINQ query comprehensions #78415
  • Correctness CI failing with roslyn-analyzers documentation errors #78414
  • new extension syntax crushes build with certain event syntax #78413
  • VS2022 Incorrectly Modifies Event Handler Return Type #78409
  • Provide overloads for IncrementalValue[s]Provider.Combine accepting more than 2 providers #78408

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-10601.163 #78410
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10601.69 #78406

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable analyzer doc validation in correctness runs #78420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure we log what the HTTP error message is if we get a failure #78418
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Debug correctnss #78417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disallow shebang in project-based programs #78411
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ignored Directives

Merged

  • Skip generate analyzer documentation to unblock ci #78412
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Move runtime async method validation into initial binding #78310
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Switch to non-scouting queue to unblock CI #78407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Revert back to scouting queue #78424
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Repack RoslynAnalyzer packages separately from Roslyn packages #78404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix syntax tree creation when modifying source generated documents #78343
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • File based programs IDE support #78208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extract out an interface for our LSP miscellaneous files workspace #78401
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce duplicated FileUtilities.GetFileTimeStamp calls #78321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • A bit of cleanup to StopWatchingReference's code to help diagnose an issue #78394
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations during SourceGeneration #78403
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure hover markdown for supported platforms uses non-breaking spaces for indentation #78405
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: extend support for key-value pairs to non-dictionary collections of `KeyValuePair<K, V>` #78274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Make compiler detection more resilient #78402
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Provide overloads for IncrementalValue[s]Provider.Combine #78316
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Adjust LocalBinderFactory.VisitInvocationExpression to handle attributes on extension parameter #78399
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Add workflow to manage 'collecting-feedback' labeled issues #78296
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch to microbuild to publish PR val build symbols #77088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Precursor work to merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures. #78308
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Methods for the Uri class #115250
  • [API Proposal]: Rename arguments for SVE GatherVector APIs #115246
  • [createdump] InitializeDAC: GetProcAddress(CLRDataCreateInstance) Failure #115245
    10.0.0
  • Arm64 SVE: Implement missing predicate methods #115244
  • Arm64 SVE: Implement missing load methods #115243
  • Arm64 SVE: Implement missing scatter methods #115242
  • [API Proposal]: Add defaulted offset to the SVE load/store APIs #115241
  • string.AsSpan(int, int) throws a misleading exception #115239

Closed

  • [Apple mobile] System.Globalization.IOS.Tests failures with undetermined language tag extensions #115238
    10.0.0
  • X509CertificateLoader can't load public key from pfx file without password #115137
  • JIT: Avx512BW Compare Debug/Release difference #114978
    10.0.0
  • Binding source generator emits bad code for tuples #115133
    Future
  • How to resolve AOT when using Marshal.PtrToStructure occurs IL2091 warnings #115140
  • [API Proposal]: `Interlocked.Increment` does not have an overload for `nint` nor `nuint` #115237
  • [API Proposal]: change GCHandle<T>.ToIntPtr to be an instance method #115053
  • Transient NullReferenceException when calling HttpClient.GetAsync #115179
  • Add TrySingle<TSource>(IEnumerable<TSource>, out TSource) #16362
  • EventSourceLogger does not propagate state data during ActivityStart #33486
  • Azure DevOps: .NET build fails on macOS 15.3 but succeeds on macOS 15.2 – what's changed? #113390
  • `DynamicallyAccessedMembers` annotations do not seem to be working on type delcarations. #113650
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: ILLinker is failing when building a mac-catalyst app #110714
  • [Feature Proposal]: Support isolated islands of assemblies for AOT compilation #115231
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 12/2/2024 3:41:04 PM #110584
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #115256
    area-Infrastructure
  • Dump more info in JitDump for HWIHNTRINSIC nodes #115255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable revocation list tests for ML-DSA and SLH-DSA #115254
    area-System.Security
  • Remove HMF from IL_Throw/IL_ThrowExact/IL_Rethrow #115253
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • EH support in the interpreter #115252
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] try enabling regions on Mac again #115251
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Attempt to load X.509 keys as ECDH keys first #115249
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Improve crossbuild inference #115247
    source-build, area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fold "X < NN && X >= 0" to "X u>= NN" #115240
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove always searching executable directory for native libraries in single-file applications #115236
    breaking-change, area-Single-File, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • Remove ymm embedded rounding from AVX10.2 #115235
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Fix UrlAttribute handling of relative Uris #115234
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Minor tensor fixes #115125
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix globalization test on mobile platforms #115248
    area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • Add VMOVD VMOVW APIs in JIT #115068
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Convert JIT_Box* to C# #115134
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Speed up floating to integer casts on x86/x64 #114410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Shrink data section for const vector loads #114040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Accelerate long -> floating casts on x86 #113930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support SLH-DSA keys in certs #115212
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #115214
    area-codeflow
  • Log error to host #114944
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Interpreter EH support in the runtime #114649
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Ensure VN produces correctly initialized simdmask_t #115227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix config source gen with value tuple #115233
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 10.0.0

Updated

  • [wasm] Use packedsimd in hexconverter #115062
    NO-MERGE
  • Unmasking EGPRs in register allocator #114867
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    tenet-performance, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2700758 #115228
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [cDAC] Implement IXCLRDataProcess.EnumMethodInstancesByAddress #115131
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add long/ulong->float cast helpers #114597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Implement ISOSDacImpl.GetAssemblyList #114800
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add CPUID for AvxVnniInt8 and AvxVnniInt16 #113956
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [DRAFT] Write barrier without any RWX pages #114982
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Includes type forwarding for System.Text.Unicode.Utf8 to the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory library #111292
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Improve System.Collections.BitArray #115069
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: refactor escape analysis to be more bv-centric #115213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up stale debugger-related surface area in ThreadPool and Task{Scheduler} #115210
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix crash during Async Break when APC and CET are enabled #114932
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.6
  • [release/9.0-staging] Don't expose TrustedCertificatesDirectory() and StartNewTlsSessionContext() to NetFx #114995
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 9.0.6
  • [release/8.0-staging] Don't expose TrustedCertificatesDirectory() and StartNewTlsSessionContext() to NetFx #115008
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.17
  • [release/9.0] Fix edge cases in Tarjan GC bridge (Android) #114682
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, os-android, area-GC-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.6
  • [Android] Support static linking of CoreCLR on Android #114629
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Enable SVE2 instruction set detection for ARM64 #115117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT: use root compiler instance for sufficient PGO observation #115119
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ML-DSA+COSE #115158
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • arm64: Additions with GetActiveElementCount() should use incp when given the same predicate #114628
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Replace NET6_0 with NET #115209
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Use SDK ILLink analyzer for OOBs for downlevel TFMs #114983
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Draft] Tar: Refine GNU timestamp handling #115211
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Update DotNetBuild.props #115229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet CLI: Create consistent console output mechanism + features #48806
  • Commit hashes inside the productCommit.txt doesn't match any repository #48801

Closed

  • Deb and RPM generation sometimes happens before sdk layout #48785

PullRequests

Created

  • draft: hack together arbitrary container layer support for SDK Containers #48804
    Area-Containers
  • Add RoslynCompilerType Vbc tests #48798
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Upgrade Issue-Labeler to v2.0.0 #48796

Merged

  • [Web SDK] Deduplicate _webToolsArtifacts before including them in None #48805
  • [10.0.1xx-preview4] Propagate DotNetReleaseShipping to the vertical manifests #48803
    Area-VMR
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview4] Fix build ordering issue when dotnet-sdk depends on redist #48802
  • Fix build ordering issue when dotnet-sdk depends on redist #48800
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview4] Do not publish symbol for helloworld binary #48792
  • Adjust dotnet test UX (for MTP) #48797
    Area-dotnet test

Updated

  • Add file-based program API for use by IDE #48749
    Area-run-file
  • sln-add: Refactor logic for autogenerating solution folders #48726
    Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48775
  • Enable 'partial' AOT of the CLI #48790
    Area-CLI
  • Unify the nullable reference type approaches #48776
    Area-CLI
  • update template descriptions to be more beginner-friendly #48609
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Implement auto-restarting on rude edit or no-effect change #48752
  • Update multi-file 'dotnet run file' documentation #48437
    documentation, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Support multiple files in file-based programs #48782
    Area-run-file
  • Add GitHub Action workflow to update man pages #48784
  • Bring back PublishDotnetWatch #48793
